00073     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00074     PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::~PagingLandScapeOctreeNode()
00075         {
00076                 removeAllChildren();
00077                 if (mParent)
00078                         mParent->removeChild(this); 
00079                 assert (!mParent);
00080         delete mOcclusionBoundingBox;
00081     }
00082     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00083     //same as SceneNode, only it doesn't care about children...
00084     void PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::_updateBounds(void)
00085     {
00086         mWorldAABB.setNull();
00087         mLocalAABB.setNull();
00088 
00089         // Update bounds from own attached objects
00090         ObjectMap::const_iterator i = mObjectsByName.begin();        
00091         while (i != mObjectsByName.end())
00092         {
00093             const MovableObject * const mo = i->second;
00094             // Get local bounds of object
00095             mLocalAABB.merge(mo->getBoundingBox());
00096             // Get World bounds of object
00097             mWorldAABB.merge(mo->getWorldBoundingBox(true));
00098 
00099             ++i;
00100         }
00101 
00102         //update the PagingLandScapeOctreeSceneManager that things might have moved.
00103         // if it hasn't been added to the PagingLandScapeOctree, add it, and if has moved
00104         // enough to leave it's current node, we'll update it.
00105 
00106         if (! mWorldAABB.isNull())
00107         { 
00108             assert (mCreator);
00109             static_cast < PagingLandScapeOctreeSceneManager * > (mCreator)->_updatePagingLandScapeOctreeNode(this);
00110         }
00111         mHalfSize = (mWorldAABB.getMaximum () - mWorldAABB.getMinimum ()) * 0.5;
00112         if (mOcclusionBoundingBox)
00113             mOcclusionBoundingBox->setupBoundingBox(mWorldAABB);
00114         if (mWireBoundingBox)
00115             mWireBoundingBox->setupBoundingBox(mWorldAABB);
00116         if (!mIsRegisteredToCam)
00117             static_cast< PagingLandScapeOctreeSceneManager * > (mCreator)->
00118             registeredNodeInCamera (this);
00119     }
00120     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00123     bool PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::_isIn(const AxisAlignedBox &box) const
00124     {
00125             // Always fail if not in the scene graph
00126             if (!mIsInSceneGraph) 
00127             return false;
00128 
00129         // Object Bounding Box Center
00130         const Vector3 center = mWorldAABB.getMaximum().midPoint(mWorldAABB.getMinimum());
00131 
00132         // Min and Max of Octree BBox
00133         const Vector3 &bmin = box.getMinimum();
00134         const Vector3 &bmax = box.getMaximum();
00135 
00136         // Object Bbox center is IN Octree BBox ?
00137         return (bmax.x >= center.x && bmax.y >= center.y && bmax.z >= center.z &&
00138                 bmin.x <= center.x && bmin.y <= center.y && bmin.z <= center.z);
00139 
00140     }
00141     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00143     void PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::_addToRenderQueue(Camera*  cam, 
00144                                         RenderQueue * const queue, 
00145                                         const bool onlyShadowCasters)
00146     {
00147         ObjectMap::iterator mit = mObjectsByName.begin();
00148 
00149         while (mit != mObjectsByName.end())
00150         {
00151             MovableObject * const mo = mit->second;
00152 
00153             mo->_notifyCurrentCamera(cam);
00154 
00155             if (mo->isVisible() &&
00156                 (!onlyShadowCasters || mo->getCastShadows()))
00157             {
00158                 mo->_updateRenderQueue(queue);
00159             }
00160 
00161 
00162             ++mit;
00163         }
00164         
00165         // check if the scene manager or this node wants the bounding box shown.
00166         if (getShowBoundingBox() || mCreator->getShowBoundingBoxes()) 
00167             _addBoundingBoxToQueue(queue);
00168             
00169         if ( mCreator->getDisplaySceneNodes())
00170             queue -> addRenderable( this );
00171 
00172     }
00173     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00174     void PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::attachObject(MovableObject* obj)
00175     {    
00176         if (mIsStaticNode)
00177         {
00178             const String movableType = obj->getMovableType();
00179             if (movableType == "Entity" || movableType == "StaticGeometry")
00180             {
00181                 if (StringUtil::startsWith(obj->getName(), "Static", false))
00182                 {
00183                      if (mIsOccluder && !StringUtil::startsWith(obj->getName(), "StaticOccluder", false))
00184                      {  
00185                         mIsOccluder = false;
00186                      }
00187                 }
00188                 else
00189                 {
00190                     mIsStaticNode = false;
00191                     mIsOccluder = false;
00192                 }
00193             }
00194             else if (movableType != "PagingLandScapeRenderable" 
00195                     && movableType != "TerrainMipMap")
00196             {
00197                  mIsStaticNode = false;
00198                  mIsOccluder = false;
00199             }
00200         }
00201         SceneNode::attachObject (obj);
00202     }
00203     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00204     MovableObject* PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::detachObject(unsigned short index)
00205     {
00206                 // if we detach 1 object, after the return, 
00207                 // there's none left so we reset the thing.
00208         if (1 == mObjectsByName.size())
00209         {
00210             mIsStaticNode = true;
00211             mIsOccluder = true;
00212         }
00213         return SceneNode::detachObject (index);
00214 
00215     }
00216     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00217     MovableObject* PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::detachObject(const String& name)
00218     {        
00219         if (1 == mObjectsByName.size())
00220         {
00221             mIsStaticNode = true;
00222             mIsOccluder = true;
00223         }
00224         return SceneNode::detachObject (name);
00225     }
00226     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00227     void PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::detachObject(MovableObject* obj)
00228     {
00229         if (1 == mObjectsByName.size())
00230         {
00231             mIsStaticNode = true;
00232             mIsOccluder = true;
00233         }
00234         SceneNode::detachObject (obj);
00235     }
00236     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00237     void PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::detachAllObjects(void)
00238     {
00239                 SceneNode::detachAllObjects ();
00240         mIsStaticNode = true;
00241         mIsOccluder = true;
00242     }
00243     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00244     void PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::_addAlreadyNotifiedToVisibles()
00245     {             
00246         if (!mNotifiedVisibles.empty())
00247         {
00248             PagingLandScapeOctreeSceneManager * const osm = static_cast < PagingLandScapeOctreeSceneManager * > (mCreator);
00249             
00250             // create the render Queue.
00251             MovableObjectList::iterator it = mNotifiedVisibles.begin(),
00252                                         itend = mNotifiedVisibles.end();
00253             while (it != itend)
00254                         {
00255                                 assert ((*it)->isVisible ());
00256                 osm->addVisible (*it);
00257                 ++it;
00258             }
00259             mNotifiedVisibles.clear();
00260         }
00261     }
00262     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00263     void PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::_addToVisibles(Camera*  cam, 
00264                                         const bool onlyShadowCasters)
00265     {             
00266         if (!mNotifiedVisibles.empty())
00267         {
00268             PagingLandScapeOctreeSceneManager * const osm = static_cast < PagingLandScapeOctreeSceneManager * > (mCreator);
00269             
00270             // create the render Queue.
00271            ObjectMap::iterator mit = mObjectsByName.begin ();
00272             while (mit != mObjectsByName.end ())
00273             {
00274                 MovableObject * const mo = mit->second;  
00275                 mo->_notifyCurrentCamera (cam); 
00276                 if (mo->isVisible () &&
00277                     (!onlyShadowCasters || mo->getCastShadows ()))
00278                 {
00279                     osm->addVisible (mo);
00280                 }
00281                 ++mit;
00282             }         
00283             mNotifiedVisibles.clear ();
00284         }
00285     }
00286     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00287     bool PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::notifyNodeObjects(Camera*  cam, 
00288                                         const bool onlyShadowCasters)
00289     {       
00290         // if at least one is visible.
00291         bool isVisible = false;
00292         mNotifiedVisibles.clear();
00293         ObjectMap::iterator mit = mObjectsByName.begin ();
00294         while (mit != mObjectsByName.end ())
00295         {
00296             MovableObject * const mo = mit->second;  
00297             mo->_notifyCurrentCamera (cam); 
00298             if (mo->isVisible () &&
00299                 (!onlyShadowCasters || mo->getCastShadows ()))
00300             {
00301                 mNotifiedVisibles.push_back (mo);
00302                 isVisible = true;
00303             }
00304             ++mit;
00305         }         
00306         return isVisible;
00307     }
00308     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00309     MovableObjectList *PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::getVisibleNotifiedNodeObjects(Camera*  cam, 
00310                                                                                 const bool onlyShadowCasters)
00311     {            
00312         notifyNodeObjects(cam, onlyShadowCasters);
00313         return &mNotifiedVisibles;
00314     }
00315     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00316     OcclusionBoundingBox* PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::getOcclusionBoundingBox()
00317     {
00318         // Create an OcclusionBoundingBox if needed
00319         if(mOcclusionBoundingBox == 0)
00320         {
00321             mOcclusionBoundingBox = new OcclusionBoundingBox();
00322             //mOcclusionBoundingBox->setRenderQueueGroup (RENDER_QUEUE_WORLD_GEOMETRY_2);
00323             mOcclusionBoundingBox->setupBoundingBox(mWorldAABB);
00324         }
00325         return mOcclusionBoundingBox;
00326     }
00327     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00328     void PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::addChild(Node* child)
00329     {
00330         mIsRegisteredToCam = false;
00331                 static_cast< PagingLandScapeOctreeSceneManager * > (mCreator)->registeredNodeInCamera(this);
00332         // call superclass method
00333         Node::addChild (child);
00334     } 
00335     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00336     void PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::_removeNodeAndChildren()
00337     { 
00338         assert (mCreator);
00339                 static_cast< PagingLandScapeOctreeSceneManager * > (mCreator)->unregisteredNodeInCamera (this);
00340         mIsRegisteredToCam = false;
00341 
00342         PagingLandScapeOctree * oct = getOctant();
00343         if (oct)
00344           oct->_removeNode(this);
00345        setOctant (0);
00346 
00347         //remove all the children nodes as well from the PagingLandScapeOctree.
00348         ChildNodeMap::iterator it = mChildren.begin();
00349         while(it != mChildren.end())
00350         {
00351             static_cast<PagingLandScapeOctreeNode *>(it->second)->_removeNodeAndChildren();
00352             ++it;
00353         }
00354     }
00355     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00356     void PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::removeAllChildren(void)
00357     {
00358         ChildNodeMap::iterator i, iend = mChildren.end();
00359         for (i = mChildren.begin(); i != iend; ++i)
00360         {       
00361             static_cast <PagingLandScapeOctreeNode* > (i->second)->_removeNodeAndChildren();    
00362                 }
00363         Node::removeAllChildren();
00364     }
00365     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00366     Node * PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::removeChild(unsigned short index)
00367     {
00368         PagingLandScapeOctreeNode *on = static_cast<PagingLandScapeOctreeNode* >(SceneNode::removeChild(index));
00369         on->_removeNodeAndChildren(); 
00370         return on; 
00371     }
00372     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00373     Node * PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::removeChild(Node* child)
00374     {
00375         PagingLandScapeOctreeNode *on = static_cast<PagingLandScapeOctreeNode* >(SceneNode::removeChild(child));
00376         on->_removeNodeAndChildren(); 
00377         return on; 
00378     }
00379     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00380     Node * PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::removeChild(const String & name)
00381     {
00382         PagingLandScapeOctreeNode *on = static_cast< PagingLandScapeOctreeNode * >(SceneNode::removeChild(name));
00383         on->_removeNodeAndChildren(); 
00384         return on; 
00385     }
00386     #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00387         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00388         void PagingLandScapeOctreeNode::setDebugCorners(PagingLandScapeOctreeSceneManager *scnMgr)
00389         {
00390             // use the ratio (OCtreeAAB / thisAAB) / 8
00391             const Vector3 &max =  mWorldAABB.getMaximum ();
00392             const Vector3 &min =  mWorldAABB.getMinimum ();
00393             
00394             Real left = 0, top = 0, right = 0, bottom = 0;
00395 
00396 
00397             const Vector3 &sceneMax = scnMgr->getBoundingBox ().getMaximum ();
00398             const Vector3 &sceneMin = scnMgr->getBoundingBox ().getMinimum ();
00399 
00400             const Real width = sceneMax.x - sceneMin.x;
00401             const Real height = sceneMax.z - sceneMin.z;
00402             if (Math::Abs(width) > 1e-08 && Math::Abs(height)  > 1e-08)
00403             {
00404                 const Real toScreenDivider = 1.0f / 3;
00405 
00406                 const Real xleft = min.x - sceneMin.x;
00407                 if (Math::Abs(xleft) > 1e-08)
00408                     left = (xleft /  width) * toScreenDivider;   
00409 
00410                 const Real ztop = min.z - sceneMin.z;
00411                 if (Math::Abs(ztop) > 1e-08)
00412                     top = (ztop /  height) * toScreenDivider;
00413 
00414                 const Real xright = max.x - sceneMin.x;
00415                 if (Math::Abs(xright) > 1e-08)
00416                     right = (xright /  width) * toScreenDivider;        
00417 
00418                 const Real zbottom = max.z - sceneMin.z;
00419                 if (Math::Abs(zbottom) > 1e-08)
00420                     bottom =  (zbottom /  height) * toScreenDivider;
00421 
00422                 getRectangle2d (scnMgr)->setCorners ((1.0f - toScreenDivider) + left, 
00423                                                         (1.0f - toScreenDivider) + top, 
00424                                                         (1.0f - toScreenDivider) + right, 
00425                                                         (1.0f - toScreenDivider) + bottom);
00426             }
00427         }  
00428     #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG   
00429 }
